text: @StephenCurry30 @NIAIDNews #SCASKSFAUCI what do you foresee happening with the progression to this pandemic in the United States? Do you feel the United States will be able to meet “his” Easter timeline? Last question: Can you please talk for him? We miss your educated and realistic science based opinion

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
